feedTitle: Stories by Paul Otto on Medium
summary: I used Matter’s open-source JavaScript code to control a light with a Raspberry Pi (RPi) and the Google Home app.  This is part 1 of a series on home automation with Matter. image by artist fiolisaviyOverviewMatter is a secure communication protocol for interoperability among smart home products and IoT devices from companies like Google, Apple, and Amazon and you...
title: Turning on a Light with JavaScript

summary: Every day there is a new read later app, despite most of them being the same.  I started my paid email newsletter journey by using my Feedbin address as my login address, but that never sat right with me, so I changed it to my primary email address and then set up my email to forward emails from addresses to read later apps.  This was fine until newsletters stopped having consistent from addresses...
title: Email Newsletters Wherever

summary: Honestly, it was really nice.  I wasn’t there for the whole convention.  I had responsibilities at home (namely, writing a novel), so I showed up for Saturday and Sunday...
title: This Year at Dragon Con
